mapper.insert: insert into t_customer(cust_username, cust_password, cust_bu_address, cust_bu_contactor, cust_bu_phone, cust_bu_name,cust_bu_introduction, cust_email) values (#{custUsername}, #{custPassword},#{custBuAddress}, #{custBuContactor}, #{custBuPhone}, #{custBuName}, #{custBuIntroduction}, #{custBuEmail})
mapper.update: update t_customer set user_username=#{custUsername}, user_password=#{custPassword} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select * from t_customer where cust_username = #{custUsername} and cust_password = #{custPassword}
